title: Dually V5 Hardware Pack
body_html:
Hardware pack for the Dually V5 Footstrap. Compatible from 2016-2020, as well as V5 and V6 Dually models.

Includes: Dually Hardware x 4 (Plastic piece is blue color)

title: Universal Leash
body_html: Stay safe and stay connected with the Universal Leash. Whether you are attaching it to a board or a wing, this hook-and-loop wrist cuff with a coil leash line will keep you connected. The coil style leash keeps the the leash collected and out of your way. Swivels at each end prevents it from twisting.

title: SlingWing Universal Harness Line (75cm, 29.5")
body_html: Add a harness line to your wing, and you’re hooked for good.

title: 6" Wake Fin- pack of 4, Black V2
body_html:
Compatible with all Slingshot wakeboards
Fin size .75" x 6"

title: 2022 Coaster
body_html: Our proven, no-gimmicks, skim-style cruiser that delivers the best of all worlds from beginner to expert levels. The Coaster rides fast and free - excellent for teaching newbies, carving hard, and integrating skim / skate style maneuvers into your bag of tricks!

title: Code V1
body_html: The all-new Code V1 is designed to keep kiteboarding fun. Built to provide performance versatility in all conditions for all disciplines, the Code is your new favorite kite. Put progression in your hands and watch as your skill level and confidence on the water improve with every session.

title: Phantasm Wake Foil Package
body_html: Elevate your foiling game with the ultimate full foil package designed for dynamic performance and versatility. This package includes the WF-1 4'6" Wake Foil Board, crafted for pumping, carving, and on-foil adventures, featuring a track mount and dual-fin setup for multi-use adaptability. Paired with the PFI 730/710 Lower Package, delivering lift, stability, and optimized performance across Surf, Wing, and Kite Foiling. Anchored by the robust Phantasm Aluminum Mast made of 7075 aircraft-grade aluminum, this kit ensures unmatched durability and control. Whether carving waves or cruising in lighter winds, this package is your gateway to foil mastery. FREE GROUND SHIPPING within contiguous USA.

title: Phantasm Wing Package
body_html: Elevate your foiling game with the ultimate wing foil package designed for dynamic performance and progression. This package includes the Wing Raider XL v1 100L Wing Foil Board, designed to pack in every wingfoil-specific feature in our design arsenal, propelling your wing game to new heights. Paired with the E 1090/710 Lower Package, delivering lift, stability, and optimized performance this set-up will inspire confidence to progress your riding. A bonus PTM 926 Front Wing is included as a higher aspect option for bigger days and more glide. Anchored by the robust Phantasm Aluminum Mast made of 7075 aircraft-grade aluminum, this kit ensures unmatched durability and control. Whether carving waves or cruising in lighter winds, this package is your gateway to foil mastery. FREE GROUND SHIPPING within contiguous USA.

title: Phantasm Travel Wing Foil Package
body_html: Bring a wing foil set-up on your next adventure with the ultimate travel wing foil package designed for dynamic performance and easy travel. This package includes the I-FLY v1 105L Inflatable Wing Foil Board, which provides lightweight, stiff, and reactive foiling performance that you can take anywhere. Paired with the PFI 928/710 Lower Package, built for progression and ease of use, this foil will get you going in the lightest of breezes and provides stability needed to keep you flying. Anchored by the robust Phantasm Aluminum Mast made of 7075 aircraft-grade aluminum, this kit ensures unmatched durability and control. Whether carving waves or cruising in lighter winds, this package is your gateway to foil mastery. FREE GROUND SHIPPING within contiguous USA.

title: Phantasm Intermediate Kite Foil Package
body_html: Optimize performance and step up to the next level on an affordable platform that will advance with you. This package includes the Alien Air V5 Kite Foil Board designed with reduced volume construction for easier water starts and fast progression. Paired with the PFI 633/710 Lower Package this set-up maximizes freeride performance with equal parts speed, stability, lift, and maneuverability. This is the most predictable and user-friendly foil on the market. Anchored by the robust Phantasm Aluminum Mast made of 7075 aircraft-grade aluminum, this kit ensures unmatched durability and control. Whether carving waves or cruising in lighter winds, this package is your gateway to foil mastery. FREE GROUND SHIPPING within contiguous USA.

title: Phantasm Advanced Kite Foil Package
body_html: Elevate your foiling game with the Phantasm Advanced Kite Foil Package. This package including the PTM 684 Front Wing, 710 aluminum fuselage PS 400 Rear Stabilizer, and 710 Fuse is by far the most advanced all-around performance foil set-up we make. This package includes the Alien Air V5 Kite Foil Board designed with reduced volume construction for easy water starts and fast progression. Anchored by the robust Phantasm Aluminum Mast made of 7075 aircraft-grade aluminum, this kit ensures unmatched durability and control. Whether carving waves or cruising in lighter winds, this package is your gateway to foil mastery. FREE GROUND SHIPPING within contiguous USA.

title: RTS Board Kit
body_html:
The Board Kit is designed for those with multiple foil boards looking to move their RTS equipped foil between boards. Set the board anchors on your board and never have to worry about your foil placement again.

This kit is a part of our RTS System. It includes 2 Board Anchors, 2 M6 20 mm bolts and 2 M6 Track Nuts. These serve as the pieces you leave in your board.

The RTS System is designed for riders who want to minimize setup time on the beach and maximize their time on the water. Instead of wasting time trying to remember where your foil goes on your board and waiting to borrow your friends tool, RTS makes it quick and easy to get your foil mounted in the correct spot in seconds.

title: One-Lock Kite Front Wings
body_html: Our One-Lock Kite Front Wings are designed to elevate your kite foiling experience, no matter your skill level. From control and stability to unmatched speed and precision, these wings cater to every rider’s progression. With innovative designs and advanced materials, the 1255, 855, and 755 wings deliver optimal performance across all conditions.

title: Slingshot T-Lock
body_html: Eliminate the need for tools with your T-Lock screw. The T-Lock screw head is spring loaded and can adjust to any position ensuring a tight fit on the board. This M6 sized screw can be used to attach any foil to any board. Sold as a singular item and does not include a M6 track nut.

title: M6 Track Nut
body_html: A singular M6 track nut to be paired with our T-Lock Screws.

title: M6 x 25mm Bolt Set of (4)
body_html: Replacement M6 Bolts to use with M6 Track Nuts. These will also work as replacement bolts for the Sleds on the RTS Kit.

title: RTS Complete Kit
body_html:
The RTS is designed for riders who want to minimize setup time on the beach and maximize their time on the water. Instead of wasting time trying to remember where your foil goes on your board and waiting to borrow your friends tool, RTS makes it quick and easy to get your foil mounted in the correct spot in seconds.

Anchors: The RTS Kit includes anchors that mount to the tracks on your foil board, ensuring your foil stays securely in the same position every time you ride. This setup makes installation and removal quick and simple, all without the need for tools.

Sleds: The sleds included in your RTS Kit are designed to be mounted to the hydrofoil top plate. Once mounted, these sleds slide under the anchors to securely lock in the front of the foil.

Slingshot T-Locks: The Slingshot T-locks, included in your RTS Kit, are used at the back of the top plate to secure it in place once the front is locked into the anchors mounted on your board.

Bolt Set: The RTS Kit includes four M6 x 25mm Torx drive bolts and four M6 track nuts, allowing you to mount your foil using the traditional method if needed. You can use the provided Torx tool to secure your foil in place.

title: RTS Pedestal Kit
body_html: Replacement Sleds, T-Locks, Bolt Set for your RTS Kit

title: One-Lock HM Carbon Mast
body_html: The HM Carbon Mast line is designed for those who prioritize stiffness above all else. Just as stiff suspension enhances the responsiveness of a sports car, this mast delivers unparalleled direct feedback on the water, allowing for quicker reactions and greater control. Riders seeking this level of precision will find the One-Lock HM Mast exceeds their expectations by improving their carving, tacking, speed, and glide.

title: One-Lock Aluminum Mast
body_html: The Aluminum Mast is perfect for riders seeking an affordable entry into the One-Lock system. It offers excellent control and responsiveness without the higher cost of carbon. The wide range of sizes makes it easier to have multiple mast lengths for different needs.

title: One-Lock Carve Tail 200
body_html: The 200 Tail is designed for riders looking to boost their stabilizer’s performance by reducing lift and enhancing tail lock. While it may not suit every rider, this stabilizer improves upwind angle and unlocks pitch in a way that introduces a new level of powered riding.

title: One-Lock Carbon Mast
body_html: The Carbon Mast Line is designed for riders looking to elevate performance and stiffness beyond the One-Lock Aluminum Mast line. The added stiffness provides increased confidence and control, making it easier to progress to more advanced maneuvers. As riders become comfortable with the aluminum mast, upgrading to the carbon mast will enhance glide through a more efficient profile. Available in three lengths, it offers customizable setup options to meet your specific foiling needs.

title: One-Lock Glide Front Wing
body_html: The Glide line of front wings is designed for riders seeking the best all-around wing for their second foil purchase. With a balance of lift, maneuverability, and consistent foot pressure, this wing allows riders to quickly adapt and gain confidence. The trust built in the foil’s feel accelerates progression, enabling riders to ride faster and with greater control.

title: One-Lock Kite QuickStart Package
body_html: The Kite Quickstart Package is designed for riders who want to be set up for success with a foil that can grow with them. Experienced kiteboarders looking to transfer their skills into foiling will find this package to be the best on the market, balancing affordability and performance. The forgiving design and responsive handling make it an ideal choice for mastering the basics while still offering room to advance. As your skills progress, the package’s upgradeable components ensure it continues to meet your needs without requiring a complete reinvestment into a new foil platform.

title: One-Lock Wing QuickStart Package
body_html: The Wing Quickstart Package is designed for riders who want to be set up for success with a foil that can grow with them. Riders looking to get into wing foiling will find this package to be the best on the market, balancing affordability and performance. The forgiving design and responsive handling make it an ideal choice for mastering the basics while still offering room to advance. As your skills progress, the package’s upgradeable components ensure it continues to meet your needs without requiring a complete reinvestment into a new foil platform.

title: One-Lock Verse Tail 270
body_html: The 270 Tail is ideal for riders starting their foil journey or those who want maximum stability. This stabilizer boosts user confidence by auto-stabilizing the board and foil, allowing riders to focus on choosing waves and improving their turning and pumping skills.

title: One-Lock Turbo Tail 180
body_html: The 180 Tail is perfect for riders looking to upgrade from their larger, more locked-in stabilizers. This smaller tail enhances maneuverability, allowing riders to better feel the energy and make quick, precise adjustments on the water. That maneuverability also adds to the efficiency of the pump, meaning the rider can accelerate to a higher speed while pumping from wave to wave or off the dock.

title: One-Lock Ease Front Wing
body_html: The Ease line of front wings is designed for riders seeking an entry-level foil that will support them through turns, foot swaps, pumping, and tacks. Built to grow with you, the Ease line of wings in the One-Lock series provides the confidence to advance your riding skills without sacrificing stability and control.

title: Screws Suck T
body_html:
Join the movement, stand in solidarity with Slingshot as we say goodbye to screws.

While our 50 free shirt promo has ended you can still show your support for the Screw Sucks movement by sporting your own One-Lock Screws Suck T.

body_html:
Join the movement, stand in solidarity with Slingshot as we say goodbye to screws.

While our 50 free shirt promo has ended you can still show your support for the Screw Sucks movement by sporting your own One-Lock Screws Suck T.

title: Wizard V4
body_html: The Wizard V4 boards were designed to pull away from the wide profile of bulky first-generation foil boards. The narrower but thicker outline increases your control, reduces windage, and allows the rider to lay hard carves without a formula board stance. The new inset bottom handle allows for easy launching.

title: Shred Sled V2
body_html: The Shred Sled 3:1 foil boards give you the freedom to pick your foiling pleasure. The compact, squared-off shape is perfect for wing, windsurf, or SUP foiling.

title: SST V6
body_html:
The SST V6 is lighter and more streamlined with a strategic design to progress the development of wave-riding performance. Designed to the standards of wave-riding pioneer and industry icon, Ben Wilson, this all-new iteration of the SST builds upon its legendary legacy.

*Only 4M and 5M In Stock

title: Glide V13 161
body_html: If you're in the early stages of your kiting life or your home spot runs heavy on light wind, then the Glide is your ride.

title: Tracker Board & SlingWing V3 Package
body_html: Experience our fun family multi-sport package to get you on the water this summer! SUP or wing on the Tracker Inflatable Board with our new SlingWing V3 wing!

title: Slingshot Trainer Kite
body_html:
Master your kite flying skills with the Slingshot Trainer Kite. This "Ram-Air" style kite is ready to fly out of the box. Simply connect the bar and lines to the kite and you will be flying. Built to fly from anything from a light breeze to 15mph, this kite turns a windy beach day to an exciting day of flying for the whole family!

This versatile kite can be used for a wide range of activities and can provide endless on the beach fun. Whether you are practicing your kite flying skills for kiteboarding, looking for a way to tow yourself on a skateboard, or simply looking for a fun activity on the beach, the Slingshot Trainer Kite has you covered.

This kite comes in 2 different models/sizes B3 (3 meter) and B2 (2 meter). We generally recommend the B3 for adults while the B2 is great for children.

title: Self-Venting Plug
body_html: Replacement self-venting plug for foil boards. Compatible with Wing Craft v2, Spencer Pro and Launch Pad Foil Boards

title: Impact XR V2
body_html: The Impact XR V2 is designed for the dedicated wave rider. If you thrive on big swells and crave the confidence to carve aggressively and slice through the wave's face, this board is your ultimate tool. With its narrow, pulled-in outline and squash tail, the Impact XR V2 offers exceptional control, precision, and drive, making it perfect for riders who aren't afraid to charge hard and push their limits when the swell gets epic.

title: Impact XR V2

If you thrive on big swells and crave the confidence to carve aggressively and slice through the wave's face, this board is your ultimate tool. With its narrow, pulled-in outline and squash tail, the Impact XR V2 offers exceptional control, precision, and drive, making it perfect for riders who aren't afraid to charge hard and push their limits when the swell gets epic.

title: Sci-Fly XR V3
body_html: The Sci-Fly XR V3 is designed for kiteboarder's who demand a board that excels in strapless freestyle. Whether you're looking to push the limits with big airs, execute powerful hacks, or navigate tight, controlled turns, this board provides the speed, grip, and durability needed for high-performance riding. Ideal for those who prioritize a lightweight, lively feel and require a board that can withstand the rigors of aggressive riding and hard landings.

title: Burner XR V2
body_html: The Burner XR V2 is engineered for kiteboarders who crave a surfboard that effortlessly adapts to any wave condition, providing a playful and responsive ride. Whether you're carving through mushy onshore waves or charging down the line in punchy surf, the Burner XR V2 offers the versatility and performance needed to excel in all conditions. With its wide-point outline and advanced tail design, the Burner delivers exceptional float, drive, and control, making it the go-to choice for riders who want to maximize their fun and performance in diverse conditions.

title: Surf Strap Single V3
body_html: Those looking for strap for a foil board or surfboard. This padded strap is fully adjustable and fits on all slingshot foil and surfboards. It comes complete with all hardware needed to mount to any board.

title: SlingWing Wrist Leash V4
body_html: Stay safe and stay connected. Hook-and-loop wrist cuff with a bungee leash line all connected by a marine grade swivel to eliminate leash twists. The bungee style leash line comes with an extension for use with larger wing sizes, 5.0 M and up. Compatible with all Slingshot Wings.

title: SlingGrip Uni Handle
body_html:
The SlingGrip Uni Handle is our new favorite way to control the wing. Instead of two individual handles, the Uni Handle is one long handle that spans the entire wing. This means the rider can slide their hand back for more power, ride one handed, have more control and ease of use, and avoid the constant search for their handles when coming out of a tack or jibe.

Compatible with SlingWing V5 and SlingWing NXT.

title: SlingGrip Uni Handle
body_html:

title: Laser Craft
body_html:
Built for riders looking to spend more time on the water. Everything about the Laser Craft is optimized to get you on foil faster no matter the wind conditions. The Step Release Tail combined with the Lunar Hull reduces drag on the water making light wind starts instant. If you are looking for the most efficient board on the water, look no further than the Laser Craft.

The Laser Craft finish is designed to be a protective layer while minimizing weight. It is intentionally designed to show carbon under the surface thus this board. The hand finishing process gives each product an individual look and thus may not identically match the product photos on the website.

title: Airtech Paddle V2
body_html: Airtech Paddle V2 features an adjustable grip for varying heights of riders. This gives the rider maximum control over their paddle-to-power ratio. The tapered blade flex design prevents the rider from injury by absorbing large forces when paddling.

title: UltraFly
body_html: The Slingshot UltraFly is tailored for the rider looking to explore the world of winging with confidence and ease. Equipped with our Rapid Release system, the UltraFly lifts off the water effortlessly without worry of the board sticking. The inflatable nature of the board eliminates the swing weight typically found on large hard top foil boards. Combine these features with the convenient packability of an inflatable board, and you will see why the UltraFly been elevated into a new league of inflatable foil boards.

title: LTF V2
body_html: The LTF or “Learn to Fly” is the first inflatable foil board that was designed to progress with you. Learn to fly the wing without the distraction of the foil by attaching the FCS II fins and sUP WINDer Keel. Once this is mastered, replace the fins and sUP WINDer with a foil to get your first feeling of flight. Want to take a break from the wind? This board triples as a SUP board. No matter the conditions, the LTF is guaranteed on the water fun for the whole family.

title: LTF V2

title: Tracker Airtech V2
body_html: The first-time winger, windsurfer, or family simply looking for a kid's swim platform, the Tracker is everyone’s favorite on the water toy. Equipped with a rear fin, sUP WINDer keel fin, and windsurf mount, the Tracker is an easy way to begin your wind sport journey. Whether you want to learn how to wing, windsurf or SUP this extra stable board is your fast track to on the water fun.

title: Flow Craft
body_html:
The rider looking to unlock their Flow State. The Flow Craft is engineered with our Carbon Forged Construction and shaped with our Compressed Curve Outline. This allows for limitless carving on swell and eliminates the worry of rail touchdowns on the water. Combine this with the Shed Deck, this wing foil board provides an insane level of response by reducing the distance between your feet and your foil. The Flow Craft is for those who demand the best.

The Flow Craft finish is designed to be a protective layer while minimizing weight. It is intentionally designed to show carbon under the surface thus this board. The hand finishing process gives each product an individual look and thus may not identically match the product photos on the website.

title: Wing Craft V3
body_html: Built for riders looking for stability and quick takeoffs. The Wing Craft V3 is engineered with OptiWidth Stability. This moves the board volume forward and extends the width of the rail outline. Combine this with the hard rear rails on the Velocity Edge, this wing foil board will get you into the Glide Zone faster.

title: SlingWing V5
body_html: The SlingWing V5 is built for riders who demand response, power and stability. The True Tension Airframe Design reduces canopy drag, eliminating wing oscillation while luffing your wing on swell, making tacks so effortless you can do them with one finger. The True Tension Airframe is reinforced by the Code 95 P Trailing Edge material which guarantees canopy tension throughout the lifespan of the wing. This combined with the unlimited grip options on the SlingGrip Uni Handle allows for effortless maneuvers when you are in the Glide Zone.

This combined with the unlimited grip options on the SlingGrip Uni Handle allows for effortless maneuvers when you are in the Glide Zone.

title: 2025 Johnny Rocket
body_html: The Johnny Rocket wakeboard is built for senders who don’t hold back in the park, and those cable riders who may even sneak in a boat session from time to time. This board was built with the intent to go big and charge hard in the park, leaving no obstacle untouched. NEW for 2025 the Johnny Rocket comes in a full size range from 139 - 151 cm so riders of all sizes can take to the skies.

title: 2025 Space Grom
body_html: The Space Grom wakeboard was made for kids who want to SHRED! Typically, kids boards leave little room for performance wakeboarding, but the Space Grom is built with the same great technology as Slingshot pro boards so that every young ripper can progress all the way to the top. Features like the Atomic Wood Core bring the board to life while the Singleshot Fusion Sidewalls maximize its durability in the park. The Super Grom is perfect for cables and boats, offered in a variety of sizes for all stages of a grom’s wakeboarding journey.

title: 2025 Bearden
body_html: The Bearden is the ultimate jib stick for rail focused park riders thanks to the soft flex that unlocks the ability to press like a BOSS! Chined rails on the Bearden are a great choice for sliding rougher surfaces like grass or ruffle pipes, chains, shopping carts, docks, or whatever else you can throw in it’s path! Overall the Bearden is one of our most flexible and playful boards for the park that will have your special meter pinned to the max on each and every lap.

title: 2025 Salmon
body_html: The Salmon wakeboard is built for riders who focus most of their time on smooth and tech rail hits, but occasionally are tempted by kicker hits too. Designed in collaboration with one of our favorite wakeboarders, Victor Salmon, It's a similar design as our original longboard "the nomad", but with a completely smooth ballistic base which equates to buttery performance on obstacles. NEW for 2025 the Salmon is now offered in two sizes, a 147 cm and Victor's preferred size, the 155 cm.

title: 2025 Copycat Pro
body_html: The Copycat Pro is built for the girls out there pushing wake park riding to new levels. Whether they’re tech wizards on rails or exploring kickers and corners, this board is a well-rounded cable ripper built to honor the most progressive female park riders around the world - the #COPYCATSCLUB. The flex of its Atomic Wood Core is one of the softest in the line which allows for buttery smooth presses and the Chined Rails help smooth out all the imperfections on sliding surfaces. If you're looking to join the strongest movement in women's wakeboarding, look no further.

title: 2025 Space Melter
body_html: Designed in partnership with the Space Mob, the Space Melter has bred an entirely new style of rider since its release. This wakeboard was made for the most progressive park riders focused primarily on tech rail riding and butters. The outline, flex, and tip / tail rocker are similar to that of a snowboard, the only difference is the snow has MELTED and you don't need any gloves or goggles! The lift tickets are a whole lot cheaper too. If you're a rider who’s grown bored of tradition setups and are looking for an entirely new park riding experience, the Space Melter is your savior.

title: 2025 Native
body_html: The Native wakeboard is fast and free on the water and features a medium flex pattern that’s rigid enough for explosive pop without sacrificing its playfulness on obstacles. It's an ideal setup for both park and boat riders, comes with fins, and is offered in a variety of sizes from 138 cm up to 156 cm. Flex Tips with Elliptical Concave are a treat in the park when it comes to unlocking your presses, and the more rigid center helps riders boost off the water for air tricks and wake riding. For 2025 the Native is designed to pair perfectly with the Zuupack boots to help you unleash your inner spirit animal wherever your riding may take you.

title: 2025 Volt
body_html: The Volt wakeboard was developed out of the need for a high-performance plus-sized park board, the Volt is an excellent choice for well-rounded riders who like to do it all. Rails, corners, kickers, winching, puddles in the yard, and however else you can imagine skimming across the water. Flex tips combine with Elliptical Concave to help riders hold onto their presses for longer and have more "hold" on round pipes. Over the past season the Volt has become a team favorite for both male and female riders, and with a look as good as this in 2025 we have a feeling the trend will continue.

title: 2025 Space Rover
body_html: The Space Rover is designed in partnership with the Space Mob crew as part of a progressive park series of boards built for the bold and the brave. Its directional outline is a complete blast for tossing buckets of water all across the lake and the ultra soft flex pattern of the Atomic Wood Core makes obstacle riding a blast as well. Ride it switch for a true "fakie" feel and stand out from the crowd as you completely re-invigorate your style with every session.

title: 2025 Contrast
body_html: The Contrast is a fast, easy-riding wakeboard built for all riding styles and all riding environments. It’s the most versatile girls board made for cable and boat wakeboarding with features like belly channels to stiffen the center and our signature flex tips to unlock deeper presses in the park. The narrow outline makes the Contrast a blast to carve as well so if you happen to find yourself in a slalom challenge of any sort this will be your cheat code to a podium finish! Whether you have a laid-back riding style or have been known to go FULL SEND, the Contrast was built to hang with every style of rider and is as "all-terrain" as it gets.

title: 2025 Nomad
body_html: The Nomad is for wakeboarders seeking a new feel on the water entirely. Whether they prefer boat or cable wakeboarding, the Nomad is the board that allows them to slow down and really dive deep into the long board lifestyle. It’s also great for those who claim to have “been there and done that” and have grown "too tired" or "too old" for wakeboarding as they know it. The Nomad allows you to dial down the speed and dial up the fun as you enjoy the simpler things. It's guaranteed to re-invigorate riders as well as deliver a far more user-friendly experience for all.

title: 2025 Coalition
body_html: The Coalition park wakeboard is built for riders with a heavy focus on rails and are known to take creative new approaches in the park. For riders who enjoy the feel of a skinny stance, the Coalition comes with an additional 5th stance insert on the inside to ride even narrower than on our other models. Refined in partnership with the Space Mob crew, this board was built for those who ride in track suits, sport dangly earrings, wear "speed shades" from the $5 rack at the gas station, and anyone else who is "in the know"....you know?

title: 2025 Solo
body_html: The Solo wakeboard is a fast, easy-riding wakeboard built for all riding styles and all riding environments. It’s the most versatile men's board made for cable and boat wakeboarding with features like belly channels to stiffen the center and our signature flex tips to unlock deeper presses in the park. The narrow outline makes the Solo a blast to carve as well so if you happen to find yourself in a slalom challenge of any sort this will be your cheat code to a podium finish! Whether you have a laid-back riding style or have been known to go FULL SEND, the Solo was built to hang with every style of rider and is as "all-terrain" as it gets.

title: 2025 Zuupack
body_html: The Zuupack boots are top of the line cable wakeboard boots built for jibbers and senders alike. The removable liners and Gummy Strap Closure System are a perfect pairing for intermediate to advanced park riders who spend hours "on the wire" pushing their riding to the next-level. Designed for those looking to unleash their spirit animal, Zuupack boot liners are built to be worn all day at the park, and even out for tacos after sunset.

title: 2025 Gummy Strap
body_html:
Gummy straps are for high performance, Slingshot boot owners, looking to freshen up the performance or colorway of boots.

Compatible with: Jewels (2017+), Rads, KTVs, Space Mobs, Groms, Options and Shredtowns.

title: 2025 Gummy Strap
body_html:
Gummy straps are for high performance, Slingshot boot owners, looking to freshen up the performance or colorway of boots.

Compatible with: Jewels (2017+), Rads, KTVs, Space Mobs, Groms, Options and Shredtowns.

title: PRO Gummy Strap
body_html: Slingshot PRO Gummy Straps are new for 2025 and developed out of the desire for an even tighter fit on all models of Slingshot wake boots. Add 1 to the mix on each boot where-ever you are looking for a stronger hold or replace all 3 standard gummies on your boot for the tightest most locked in feel possible. PRO Gummies are sold at full length and can be trimmed to the desired length.

title: 2025 Jewel
body_html: With over a decade of experience and design evolution, the Jewel is truly a timeless boot that maximizes rider comfort and confidence. NEW for 2025, it features a removable liner to satisfy the demands of park riders around the world. Protect your feet as you walk back to the dock and strap in with ease thanks to the dual zone Gummy Strap Closure System. If you're looking for the lightest weight and highest performance boot with a removable liner, look no further!

title: 2025 Space Mob
body_html: Space Mob boots were built to honor the most progressive park riders in the world. From tech wizards on the rails to those exploring kickers and corners, these boots were built for all of mankind, as well a few extraterrestrials. Comfort is unmatched thanks to the Gummy Strap Closure System and removable liners which feature a newly simplified lacing system that goes the distance. These boots can be tuned stiffer or softer with the detachable tongue inserts and the overall on-water "feel" is out of this world thanks to the Bottomless Base System.

title: 2025 Copycat Boot
body_html: The Copycat boot was built to honor the most progressive female park riders around the world. Whether they're tech wizards on the rails or exploring kickers and corners, these boots are as comfortable as a cat’s fur coat thanks to the Gummy Strap Closure System and removable liners that practically "meow" as your feet slide in. They can be tuned stiffer or softer with the detachable tongue inserts and also maximize rider "feel" on the water thanks to the Bottomless Base System.

title: WF-2 V6
body_html: The WF-2 V6 is a hybrid wakesurf / foil board built for wakesurfers looking to venture into the world of foiling. The WF-2 V6 is a ripping wakesurf board with a proven magical outline that features twin FCS fin boxes and a foil track for when it comes time to add a foil and fly. This board is the perfect match for every wake boat and fun for the whole family, beginners to experts in both disciplines.

title: Misfit V12
body_html: Built for riders looking for a durable twin tip that has no limits. A stiffer layup improves the boards upwind ability while the Single-Shot Fusion Sidewalls create a smooth ride in the choppiest of waters. Whether you are putting laps in at your local spot, or sending big airs off wind chop, the Misfit V12 has you covered.

title: Formula V4
body_html: Designed specifically for twin tip riders looking to fly. The Featherlight Tips cut through chop with ease while the Textreme -30/+30 high modulus carbon construction ensures stiff and solid pop off the water. The Formula V4 is for those who demand the best from their kiteboarding twin tip.

title: ERA
body_html: Built for the rider who wants the most explosive pop, the smoothest landings, and does not want their gear to hold them back from breaking their personal big air records. Designed in tandem with Jeremy Burlando, the ERA redefines performance standards for the next generation of riders.

title: Glide V14
body_html: If you’re in the early stages of your kiting life or your home spot runs heavy on light wind, then the Glide is your ride.

title: Code NXT
body_html: The Code NXT is leading the charge of the New School Big Air kite movement. This 3-strut 2024 GKA Championship winning design is for riders who are as serious about pushing the boundaries of big air kiteboarding as Jeremy Burlando. Built with the NXT Aluula Airframe, The Code NXT is for those who demand superior control and maneuverability and seek to achieve massive boosts and seamless loops with confidence.

title: Code V2
body_html: Boasting the same DNA as the Code NXT, the Code V2 features Sheet and Go ride-ability to maximize your session while also delivering the ability to ride like the pros. This new design is for riders demanding a more intuitive feel and security in their kite. The Code V2 allows you to enjoy daily sessions whether you are on the water or flying 30 meters above it.

title: Shred Sled V1 5'9"
body_html: The Shred Sled 5'9" 110L, 3:1 foil board gives you the freedom to pick your foiling pleasure. The compact, squared-off shape is perfect for the intermediate or advanced wing, windsurf, or SUP foiler.

title: Hover Glide Aluminum Mast to Phantasm Fuse Adapter
body_html:
Have a Hover Glide mast and want to get into the new Phantasm platform? This mast-to-fuse adapter is your answer.

Just attach the adapter to the bottom of your Hover Glide mast using your Hover Glide A-Position mast to fuse hardware. M8 X 45mm Barrel Head bolts.

**Hardware not included.

title: PTM 999 Front Wing
body_html: The PTM 999 is designed for larger riders who seek maximum performance, stability, and control while foiling on the water.

title: PTM 799 Front Wing
body_html: If you’re the type who loves pushing the limits, craving faster speeds, tighter turns, and an ultra-responsive ride, then the PTM 799 is crafted just for you. Whether you’re tacking, gliding, or pumping through swells, this wing amplifies your Flow State foiling experience to a whole new level.

title: 2010 - 2019 800lb Pigtail
body_html:
Compatible products:
800lb pigtail line is compatible with the Sentry, Sentinel, Guardian and Compstick bars

title: 2019 Guardian Depower Trim Rope Handle
body_html: Replacement handle for 2019 guardian trim rope. Compatible with guardian bars 2014 -2019.

title: Cross Sport 11'0 Airtech
body_html: The all-new Cross Sport inflatable SUP is a multi-sport inflatable SUP board fitted with a windsurf sail attachment and a removable keel fin. This board allows you to gather the basics of upwind and downwind sailing with a wing or sail on a soft, stable platform before taking the next step to a dedicated foil setup.

title: Cross Sport 11'0 Airtech
body_html: The all-new Cross Sport inflatable SUP is a multi-sport inflatable SUP board fitted with a windsurf sail attachment and a removable keel fin. This board allows you to gather the basics of upwind and downwind sailing with a wing or sail on a soft, stable platform before taking the next step to a dedicated foil setup.

title: Crossbreed Airtech Paddle
body_html: The Crossbreed Airtech SUP Paddle is a 3 piece, adjustable paddle that fits paddlers of all sizes and abilities.

title: SlingWing NXT
body_html: The SlingWing NXT is the ultimate choice for riders looking for state-of-the-art materials and designs to help them take their skills to the next level. Riders seeking increased control and effortless tacking will appreciate the ultra stiff leading edge and lightweight material composition.

title: Universal CSS Elastic Safety Line (Bungee)
body_html: This CSS Bungee is compatible with Slingshot Compstick bars (Guardian & Sentinel) made since 2010.

title: Fast Track Hardware Kit
body_html: Boot mounting hardware kit for older model Slingshot wakeboards with Fastrack.

title: Simulator Soft Top V2 5'2"
body_html: A larger, friendlier soft top, designed to make your journey into foiling as approachable and painless as possible. Use it as a learning tool, a forever board if you're just a casual foiler, or as a crossover setup in the surf or behind the boat.

title: Sentry V1, V1.1, V2 Clam Cleat
body_html: Replacement clam cleat for Sentry V1, V1.1, V2.

title: Sentry Clam Cleat Set + Flagging Line w/ Tube
body_html: This product contains all the parts needed to replace your clam cleat assembly and your flagging line tube on your Sentry bar.

title: Sentry Quick Release STD Locking
body_html: This item is a replacement chicken bone/donkey dik for your Sentry bar chicken loop.

title: Hover Glide Front Wing Tightening Shim
body_html: This shim and bolt pack will fix any wobble you experience in your Hover Glide front wing.

title: Crossbreed 11' Airtech Package w/sUP WINDer
body_html: The Crossbreed 11’ inflatable SUP, that we’ve all come to love, now doubles as the perfect board to learn how to Wing surf. The removable sUP WINDer keel fin, combined with the normal tail fin, will allow you to stay upwind while using a SlingWing and propel you across the water.

title: WF-2 V5 4'6" Board Only
body_html: As the trend in foiling continues to move towards shorter boards, we redesigned the WF-2 soft-top foilboard to pack the same amount of surface area into a shorter 4'6" board length, making it an excellent choice for all levels of foilers.

title: Launch Pad V1
body_html:
The Launch Pad was designed to be efficient and effective in any condition for riders looking for instant performance in wing, prone, or tow-in foiling.

The Spencer Pro finish is designed to be a protective layer while minimizing weight. It is intentionally designed to show carbon under the surface thus this board. The hand finishing process gives each product an individual look and thus may not identically match the product photos on the website.

title: Launch Pad V1
body_html:
The Launch Pad was designed to be efficient and effective in any condition for riders looking for instant performance in wing, prone, or tow-in foiling.

The Spencer Pro finish is designed to be a protective layer while minimizing weight. It is intentionally designed to show carbon under the surface thus this board. The hand finishing process gives each product an individual look and thus may not identically match the product photos on the website.

title: RapidTrack Flag Screw M6 x 25mm
body_html: "Flag Screws" are a complete toolless hardware solution that will eliminate managing screws and track nuts or losing them when they fall out of the board in transit. *Flag Screws are M6, a smaller size than our standard foil track hardware. We recommend purchasing RapidTrack T-Nuts along with these screws to ensure compatibility.

title: G 900/872 Lower Package V1
body_html: The G 900/872 Lower Package delivers enduring performance that you'll never outgrow. Built for maximum glide efficiency, our medium/high-aspect G Series front wings provide rock-solid stability and plenty of low-end get up and go.

title: Switchplate V1 Screws
body_html: Replacement Screws for the Switchplate. Comes with screws ONLY

title: Switchplate V1
body_html: Replacement Switchplate and screws for wake boots 2024 and newer

title: SlingWing V4
body_html: The SlingWing V4 is the ultimate choice for riders looking for a wing to help them take their skills to the next level. Riders seeking increased control and effortless tacking with a compact wingspan for on-the-water transition or spinning on jumps. The upward lift on the nose handle provides enhanced drifting capabilities while flagging out while swell riding.

title: WF-1 V5
body_html: The WF1 V5 is for those learning to fly in the quick flite category all the way to experts in the flow state. The WF1 V5 is also the best option for anyone who wants to get serious about strapped jumping thanks to the user friendly nose profile that lands and recovers like a dream!

title: G 1007/710 Lower Package V1
body_html: This setup extends performance in the glide zone. Perfect for super-weight riders that want to optimize their foil setup for a maximum glide without losing take-off or drop-out speed, turning, or stability. Stabilizer Step Method Compatible.

title: G 1007 (1700 cm2) Front Wing V1
body_html: This setup extends performance in the glide zone. Perfect for super-weight riders that want to optimize their foil setup for a maximum glide without losing take-off or drop-out speed, turning, or stability.

title: PTM 899 (925 cm2) Front Wing V1
body_html: You tack, glide, and pump on a swell. You're becoming one with your foil. Now you want to out-glide your friends while making tighter turns than they thought possible. Your goal is "Total Mastery," with elegance and efficiency being the mindset you incorporate into your riding.

title: Puddle Pumper V1
body_html: Foilers looking to pump anywhere and everywhere on all bodies of water—with or without a boat or wave. Made for the complete foiling addict who can't be bothered to wait around for the next boat ride. It's better to have it and not need it than to need it and not have it!

title: Dwarf Craft V3
body_html: Wake foilers looking to take their skills to the next-level and advanced kiters looking to transfer those skills into being advanced foilers. The Dwarf Craft V3 is a stable yet compact platform for early take-offs, effortless carving, pumping, and entering the Glide Zone.

title: Phantasm Quickstart Wake Foil Package
body_html: The Phantasm Quick Start Wake Foil Package is great for all riders looking to fly for the first time. It's extremely user-friendly for beginners but high performance enough to be the foil of choice for the captain of the boat as well. If you only want 1 foil on your boat, this is the most shareable and versatile option to put a grin on everyone's face.

title: Phantasm Quickstart Kite Foil Package
body_html: Experienced kiteboarders looking to transfer their kiteboarding skills into foiling skills and know they are on a foil platform that will allow them to optimize performance easily and more affordably when they have the skill to step up to the next level.

title: Phantasm Quickstart Wing Foil Package
body_html: Wing Foilers who are new to the sport and want to learn all the fundamental moves fast, knowing they are on a high-performance foil platform that will allow them to optimize performance easily and more affordably when they have the skill to step up to the next level.

title: PTM 899/710 Lower Package V1
body_html: You tack, glide, and pump on a swell. You're becoming one with your foil. Now you want to out-glide your friends while making tighter turns than they thought possible. Your goal is "Total Mastery," with elegance and efficiency being the mindset you incorporate into your riding.

title: Fly Strap V2
body_html: Riders who appreciate a lighter design and streamlined comfort allow you to focus on what matters most: kiteboarding.

title: Dually V7
body_html: Riders looking for maximum control, comfort on big landings and adjustability to optimize your feet and riding style, with no gimmicks.

title: Phantasm Stabilizer 340 Turbo-Tail V1 (184 cm2)
body_html: You ride a lot, and you are skilled at all tricks, transitions, big swell, and pumping. You are on the way to riding in a flow state. The Phantasm Stabilizer 340 Turbo-Tail is the right equipment selection at this journey stage. Following our Stabilizer Step Method will harmonize your equipment, body, and mind for new unlocked performance.

body_html: Riders looking to experience unparalleled control and maneuverability on the water. Whether you are behind a kite or a boat, the Hope Craft V2 is not just a foil board, it's a tool for those who want to push the boundaries of what's possible.

title: Phantasm Stabilizer 360 V-Tail V1 (202 cm2)
body_html: You are fast-tracking past the fundamental moves that got you addicted to foiling in the first place. Identifiable by how you ride. You are at an exciting stage where optimizing for glide is essential to continue your progression. Phantasm 360mm Stabilizer is the right equipment selection at this stage in the journey. Following our Stabilizer Step Method will harmonize your equipment, body, and mind for new unlocked performance. Let's face it, ripping is super fun.

title: UFO V3
body_html: For kite foilers who demand more from less and understand progressing and riding in a flow state, is built on the connection between body, mind, and equipment. Anything that impedes the best possible connection starting with the kite, and then transferring to the lines, bar, board, and foil all need to be perfectly harmonized.

title: RPX V2
body_html: For enthusiasts or pros looking to progress in their freestyle journey. If you are dialing in your next handle pass with world-class style and precision. Specifically addresses the need for reliable power, excellent pop then slack to create the moment of flight with no power to enable pure freestyle moves.

title: Boss Hoss Fin Pack
body_html: (3) 2'" G10 fiberglass fins with metric hardware. Compatible with Slingshot Sports Boss Hoss, Coaster, Butter Bar, and Skim Bender boards.

title: WF-2 Fin Pack (2 x FCSII Carver Quad Side Byte, Small)
body_html: A twin FCS II fin pack for the WF2 foil board - Simply remove the foil and install the FCS surf fins (tool-less) and you're ready to rip on a high performance wakesurf board.

title: Gremlin Fin Pack (2 x FCSII Carver Quad Side Byte, small & 1 x 2" nub fin)
body_html: Compatible with all Gremlin board models/versions, FCS II twin fins provide the perfect balance of drive on rail and the 2" nub "cheater fin" down the center line eliminates play while riding flat. FCS II fins install without the use of a tool, while the center nub fin is fixed with the supplied FCS tool.

title: Mothership 6" Fin (w/ fin tab & thumb screw)
body_html: For all the soul surfers out there, this 6" single fin is compatible with all versions and sizes of mothership wakesurf boards - bringing a whole new flavor and feel to wakesurfing.

title: HG Wing to Phantasm Converter Fuse
body_html: This converter fuse allows you to use your Hover Glide front wings and stabilizer with any Phantasm mast.

title: HG Wing to Phantasm Converter Fuse
body_html: This converter fuse allows you to use your Hover Glide front wings and stabilizer with any Phantasm mast.

title: Session Saver Kit V1
body_html: The Session Saver Kit is the session insurance plan you need with you at all times. This kit helps you repair rips tears and punctures in both bladders and canopies quickly and easily.

title: G 700 (900 cm2) Front Wing V1
body_html: Our G-Series wings are all about the ability to glide and pump, with a Medium/High aspect shape that does not sacrifice low-end get-up and go. The G-700's short wingspan gives it plenty of speed and agility while still being long on glide.

title: PTM 701 (700 cm2) Front Wing V1
body_html: The PTM 701 was built for speed. It has a stable locked-in feel that encourages you to push it faster and faster. The fact that it is less roll reactive than the other PTM wings makes it easier to use and gives you the confidence-inspiring stability to push it faster and faster.

title: Javelin PRO Fixed RD Carbon Boom V1
body_html: The Javelin Pro Fixed Carbon Boom features an ultra-thin 25mm diameter designed for riders with smaller hands or those venturing into cold water with thick gloves. The 1100mm length (Small) fits wings from 2.5-4.0. The longer 1500mm version (Large) fits wings from 4.5-7.5.

title: Javelin PRO Fixed RD Carbon Boom V1
body_html: The Javelin Pro Fixed Carbon Boom features an ultra-thin 25mm diameter designed for riders with smaller hands or those venturing into cold water with thick gloves. The 1100mm length (Small) fits wings from 2.5-4.0. The longer 1500mm version (Large) fits wings from 4.5-7.5.

title: Freestyle V3
body_html: Freestyle V3 is our dedicated freestyle foil board that comes in 87L and 115L sizes. Now featuring updated foil tracks, plus an inset bottom carry handle to get you in and out of the water with ease. The Freestyle V3 will have you out there riding with style!

title: Freestyle V3
body_html: Freestyle V3 is our dedicated freestyle foil board that comes in 87L and 115L sizes. Now featuring updated foil tracks, plus an inset bottom carry handle to get you in and out of the water with ease. The Freestyle V3 will have you out there riding with style!

title: Surf Strap Single V2
body_html: With a 2" wider hole pattern your foot is right where you need it - straddling your fin box. Properly placed footing over your rear fins gives you the ultimate power position for throwing big.

title: Half Strap Single V3
body_html: The Half Strap V3 is an excellent addition to your foil setup when learning. It makes it super easy to stay connected to your board for deep-water starts and also allows your foot to naturally disconnect in the case of a fall so you can get away from the board with ease.

title: Crisis V2 - B Board
body_html: The Slingshot Crisis twin tip has a beginner to intermediate rocker profile and mellow single concave that allows you to move naturally and comfortably on the water.

title: Crisis V2 - B Board
body_html: The Slingshot Crisis twin tip has a beginner to intermediate rocker profile and mellow single concave that allows you to move naturally and comfortably on the water.

title: 2023 Gummy Strap - Multiple Colors
body_html: The secret ingredient to Slingshot's signature Gummy Strap Closure System. This is a single full-length Gummy Strap that can be trimmed to the desired length. Compatible with all Slingshot wake boot models that feature the Gummy Strap Closure System.

title: 2023 Gummy Strap - Multiple Colors
body_html: The secret ingredient to Slingshot's signature Gummy Strap Closure System. This is a single full-length Gummy Strap that can be trimmed to the desired length. Compatible with all Slingshot wake boot models that feature the Gummy Strap Closure System.

title: Phantasm Rear Wing Shim Kit
body_html: Customize your ride with this 6 shim pack for the Phantasm foil. The shims allow you to increase or decrease your stabilizer's angle of attack in 0.5mm increments +/- 1.5mm in either direction.

title: SlingWing Universal Wing Wrist Leash V3
body_html:
Stay safe and stay connected. Hook-and-loop wrist cuff with a bungee leash line. The bungee style leash line comes with an extension for use with larger wing sizes, 5.0 M and up.

Package Includes:

  • One (1) Velcro wrist cuff with 117 cm(relaxed) elastic Amsteel rope attached.
  • One (1) 30cm static double loop pigtail.

title: PTM 930 (950 cm2 ) Front Wing V1
body_html: Our high-aspect, carbon-fiber PTM Series is for foilers who demand speed and agility but still need dependable stability for those critical moments. This is a great wing for intermediate and advanced wingers who crave high-aspect performance or wave riders looking to hold their speed and pump back to the next wave. Despite its wide 930 cm wingspan, it has a very loose, playful feeling under foot.

title: PTM 825 (758 cm2) Front Wing V1
body_html: Our high-aspect, carbon-fiber PTM Series is for foilers who demand speed and agility but still need dependable stability for those critical moments. This is an exceptional front wing for medium- to high-wind winging and riding big waves.

title: G 1000 (1355 cm2) Front Wing V1
body_html: Featuring a medium-to high-aspect shape that offers rock-solid stability and plenty of low-end get up and go, our G Series wings are all about maximizing glide efficiency. The G Series wings deliver enduring drive, glide, and pump performance that you'll never outgrow.

title: G 900 (1263 cm2) Front Wing V1
body_html: Featuring a medium-to high-aspect shape that offers rock-solid stability and plenty of low-end get up and go, our G Series wings are all about maximizing glide efficiency. The G Series wings deliver enduring drive, glide, and pump performance that you'll never outgrow.

title: G 800 (1173 cm2) Front Wing V1
body_html: Featuring a medium- to high-aspect shape that offers rock-solid stability and plenty of low-end get up and go, our G Series wings are all about maximizing glide efficiency. The G Series wings deliver enduring drive, glide, and pump performance that you'll never outgrow.

title: E 1090 (2200 cm2) Front Wing V1
body_html: Built to cruise, our medium-aspect, carbon-fiber E Series wings will get you up on foil early with confidence inspiring stability. From wake to wing to surf, our E Series wings make foiling easy across multiple sport categories.

title: E 990 (1800 cm2) Front Wing V1
body_html: Built to cruise, our medium-aspect, carbon-fiber E Series wings will get you up on foil early with confidence inspiring stability. From wake to wing to surf, our E Series wings make foiling easy across multiple sport categories.

title: E 866 (1550 cm2) Front Wing V1
body_html: Built to cruise, our medium-aspect, carbon-fiber E Series wings will get you up on foil early with confidence inspiring stability. From wake to wing to surf, our E Series wings make foiling easy across multiple sport categories.

title: G 800/710 Lower Package V1
body_html: The G 800/710 Lower Package delivers enduring performance that you'll never outgrow. Built for maximum glide efficiency, our medium/high-aspect G Series front wings provide rock-solid stability and plenty of low-end get up and go.

title: E 1090/710 Lower Package V1
body_html: The E 1090/710 Lower Package was designed to make foiling as easy as possible for every rider of every ability. From wake to wing to surf, our E Series wings make foiling easy across multiple sport categories.

title: PTM 930/710 Lower Package V1
body_html: The PTM 930/710 Lower Package is the pinnacle of high-aspect efficiency. Fine tuned for foilers who demand speed and agility but still need dependable stability for those critical moments, the PTM 930 front wing shines at top-end speeds. This is a great lower for intermediate and advanced wingers who crave high-aspect performance.

title: PTM 825/710 Lower Package V1
body_html: The PTM 825/710 Lower Package is the pinnacle of high-aspect efficiency. Fine tuned for foilers who demand speed and agility but still need dependable stability for those critical moments, the PTM 825 front wing shines at top-end speeds. This is a great lower for medium- to high-wind winging and riding big waves.

title: Skyscraper Carbon Mast V1 125cm
body_html:
The tallest, stiffest, strongest, and longest mast on the market. Made with high modulus carbon. There is nothing higher.

title: LTF V1 Inflatable
body_html: The LTF of "Learn To Fly" is the first inflatable foil board with both foil tracks and keel fin slot allowing you to progress from your first day of finned winging to full foiling.

title: LTF V1 Inflatable
body_html: The LTF of "Learn To Fly" is the first inflatable foil board with both foil tracks and keel fin slot allowing you to progress from your first day of finned winging to full foiling.

title: Manticore V1
body_html: The Manticore V1 was designed to help wingers progress and teach their friends with its durable compression molded construction. It features mellow chined rails and a flat bottom rocker for quick release onto foil and enough width to be stable even in choppy water.

title: Manticore V1

body_html:

title: Sentry V1.1 Base Bar
body_html: This product includes one(1) SentryV1.1 base bar unit in either 17", 20", or 23". This product is a BAR ONLY replacement and is intended to be used as a full replacement for a worn out or broken Sentry V1.1 kite bar.

title: Javelin V1 with Window
body_html:
The Javelin boom wing delivers a stunning level of power and control with simple and secure push pin boom connectivity. Featuring an ultra-compact wingspan and on-the-fly power tuning using the canopy tensioning strap to flatten or expand the wings profile. Whether you are cruising one-handed with style, riding backwinded or trying to keep the wingtips out of the water, the advantage is clear.

Pro Boom Sizing

Small: 2.5-4.0 meter

Large: 4.5-7.5 meter

title: Javelin Adjustable Carbon Boom V1
body_html: This two-piece carbon boom features an EVA foam grip and push-button connectivity to our Javelin wing.

title: Foil Mounting Hardware M8 x 25mm TORX (Set of 4)
body_html: Foil mounting screws (set of 4) for Slingshot foil boards. Size is M8 x 25mm, Stainless Steel Tapered Torx Head. Paired with Foil Track Nut hardware (sold separately).

title: WF-T V2 4'5" Board Only
body_html: The WF-T is our entry-level 4'5" foil board and is compression molded, which increases the overall durability and decreases buoyancy so riders don't have to fight against the float of the board when starting out.

title: WF-1 V4 4'2" Board Only
body_html: The WF-1 is our top-of-the-line wake-foil board for advanced and expert foilers. Built using our premium XR carbon-reinforced surf construction, the WF-1 is the lightest wake-foil board we've ever produced.

title: Flying Fish V2
body_html: The Flying Fish V2 is your ticket to prone, wing, kite, wake, and tow-in foiling. The ample width makes getting up and going easy while the durable EPS foam core can take a thrashing. Both Y-strap and offset front foot options allow you to tailor the Flying Fish to your riding style.

title: Flying Fish V2
body_html: The Flying Fish V2 is your ticket to prone, wing, kite, wake, and tow-in foiling. The ample width makes getting up and going easy while the durable EPS foam core can take a thrashing. Both Y-strap and offset front foot options allow you to tailor the Flying Fish to your riding style.

title: Flying Fish V2
body_html: The Flying Fish V2 is your ticket to prone, wing, kite, wake, and tow-in foiling. The ample width makes getting up and going easy while the durable EPS foam core can take a thrashing. Both Y-strap and offset front foot options allow you to tailor the Flying Fish to your riding style.

title: Spencer Pro V1
body_html:
The Spencer Pro was designed to be efficient and effective in any condition for riders looking for instant performance in wing, prone, or tow-in foiling

The Spencer Pro finish is designed to be a protective layer while minimizing weight. It is intentionally designed to show carbon under the surface thus this board. The hand finishing process gives each product an individual look and thus may not identically match the product photos on the website.

title: Boss Hoss V2 5'4"
body_html: The Boss Hoss is built for all those surfers out there who have "tried everything and just can't seem to let go of the rope!" FREE GROUND SHIPPING within contiguous USA.

title: 2023 Coaster
body_html: Our proven, no-gimmicks, skim-style cruiser that delivers the best of all worlds from beginner to expert levels. The Coaster rides fast and free—excellent for teaching newbies, carving hard, and integrating skim/skate-style maneuvers into your bag of tricks!

title: 2023 Coaster
body_html: Our proven, no-gimmicks, skim-style cruiser that delivers the best of all worlds from beginner to expert levels. The Coaster rides fast and free—excellent for teaching newbies, carving hard, and integrating skim/skate-style maneuvers into your bag of tricks!

title: 2023 Coaster

title: 2023 Mothership
body_html: A nostalgic longboard-inspired cruiser designed to be ridden with ease while exploring the deck space with all ten of those little piggies. Style points are everything and this shape is your cheat code to the front of the running...

title: 2023 Mothership
body_html: A nostalgic longboard-inspired cruiser designed to be ridden with ease while exploring the deck space with all ten of those little piggies. Style points are everything and this shape is your cheat code to the front of the running...

title: 2023 Space Melter 165
body_html: The Space Melter is an all-new twin tip from the Space Mob with a snow inspired "p-nut" outline. "In the future all wakeboards will look this way" is the word on the streets from the most progressive wake-park riders in the game.

title: 2023 Space Rover
body_html: The Space Rover is the 4th rendition of our all-purpose wakepark directional wakeboard in collaboration with the Space Mob. This symmetrical directional design is built for trendsetters who aren't afraid to be the first of their kind.

title: 2023 Space Rover
body_html: The Space Rover is the 4th rendition of our all-purpose wakepark directional wakeboard in collaboration with the Space Mob. This symmetrical directional design is built for trendsetters who aren't afraid to be the first of their kind.

title: 2023 Bearden 156
body_html: The Bearden 156 is a special signature edition of the Terrain wakeboard, designed for everyone's favorite "Space Grom," Mr. Crosse Bearden.

title: 2023 Salmon 155
body_html: The Salmon is built for riders who focus most of their time on smooth and tech rail hits, but occasionally are tempted by kicker hits too.

title: 2023 Super Grom
body_html: The Super Grom: is one of the highest performance boards for young riders ever made. The Super Grom is built with our lively Atomic Wood Core and a softer flex that lightweight riders are able to manipulate, so they can ride with the same style and agility (if not more) than their elder mentors.

title: 2023 Super Grom
body_html: The Super Grom: is one of the highest performance boards for young riders ever made. The Super Grom is built with our lively Atomic Wood Core and a softer flex that lightweight riders are able to manipulate, so they can ride with the same style and agility (if not more) than their elder mentors.

title: 2023 Super Grom
body_html: The Super Grom: is one of the highest performance boards for young riders ever made. The Super Grom is built with our lively Atomic Wood Core and a softer flex that lightweight riders are able to manipulate, so they can ride with the same style and agility (if not more) than their elder mentors.

title: 2023 Copycat Pro
body_html: Our cable-specific women's park board designed in partnership with the raddest crew in women's park riding: the #Copycatsclub.

title: 2023 Copycat Pro
body_html: Our cable-specific women's park board designed in partnership with the raddest crew in women's park riding: the #Copycatsclub.

title: 2023 Copycat Pro
body_html: Our cable-specific women's park board designed in partnership with the raddest crew in women's park riding: the #Copycatsclub.

title: 2023 Windsor
body_html: The Windsor is based on one of our most popular park boards, the Coalition, but with mods to make it more suitable for hard edging, huge kicker hits, and deeper presses. With subtle tip and tail channels and a more aggressive rail profile, the Windsor offers the perfect amount of traction.

title: 2023 Windsor
body_html: The Windsor is based on one of our most popular park boards, the Coalition, but with mods to make it more suitable for hard edging, huge kicker hits, and deeper presses. With subtle tip and tail channels and a more aggressive rail profile, the Windsor offers the perfect amount of traction.

title: 2023 Contrast
body_html: The ultimate crossover board designed to be ridden anywhere your adventures take you—from lakes to rivers, cables, boats, winches and beyond.

title: 2023 Contrast
body_html: The ultimate crossover board designed to be ridden anywhere your adventures take you—from lakes to rivers, cables, boats, winches and beyond.

title: 2023 Contrast
body_html: The ultimate crossover board designed to be ridden anywhere your adventures take you—from lakes to rivers, cables, boats, winches and beyond.

title: 2023 Coalition
body_html: The Coalition is the gold standard of cable wakeboarding. It's got a magical combination of outline, tip shape, and rocker that delivers endless amounts of entertainment in the park—no matter your riding style. Featuring custom art by Wesley Mark Jacobsen of the Space Mob.

title: Wing Craft V2
body_html: The Wing Craft V2 is all about getting you up to foiling speed as quickly as possible and bouncing you right back up onto foil after any jump or touchdown. The compact outline, flat bottom rocker, and hard rear rails will have you spending less time stuck to the water and more time flying above it.

title: Machine V2
body_html: Built on the breakthrough big-air platform introduced last year, the Machine V2 is even lighter and more advanced than its predecessor. A revamped leading edge material helps reduce weight and increase height and hangtime, while the responsive wingtip and efficient aspect ratio continue to take you even higher.

title: Dream Rider V1
body_html: The all-new Dream Rider is a performance twin tip with a simply unforgettable ride. The deepest concave in the industry and our skinniest profile to date creates a dream-like ride that floats and carves over all chop and water conditions.

title: Dream Rider V1

title: Dream Rider V1

title: Luna V2
body_html: Smaller, lighter riders, compromise and sacrifice no more! The Luna V2 has been designed specifically for you. Borrowing DNA from our iconic Misfit, the narrow-bodied Luna V2 has the tech and performance you demand from a freeride twin tip in a design dialed for lighter riders.

title: Luna V2
body_html: Smaller, lighter riders, compromise and sacrifice no more! The Luna V2 has been designed specifically for you. Borrowing DNA from our iconic Misfit, the narrow-bodied Luna V2 has the tech and performance you demand from a freeride twin tip in a design dialed for lighter riders.

title: Super Natural V2
body_html: The Super Natural V2 is an entirely different breed of twin tip except it's not really a twin tip at all. Designed with a nose and a tail, the Super Natural V2 offers unmatched drive and control when loading up for a huge boost or tearing the face off some shore break.

title: Super Natural V2
body_html: The Super Natural V2 is an entirely different breed of twin tip except it's not really a twin tip at all. Designed with a nose and a tail, the Super Natural V2 offers unmatched drive and control when loading up for a huge boost or tearing the face off some shore break.

title: Asylum V6
body_html: The Asylum V6 returns as the top choice for big air and core riders. With a fierce combination of tip/tail channels, aggressive rocker, and new dual stitched carbon stringers the Asylum V6 smoothly yields both explosive pop and lock-down grip like no other board we make.

title: Asylum V6
body_html: The Asylum V6 returns as the top choice for big air and core riders. With a fierce combination of tip/tail channels, aggressive rocker, and new dual stitched carbon stringers the Asylum V6 smoothly yields both explosive pop and lock-down grip like no other board we make.

title: Misfit V11 Carbon
body_html: What do you get when one of the most revered high-performance freeride twin tips ever gets built with an completely carbon layup? Enter the Misfit Carbon V11, one of the lightest, smoothest, and driest rides of any twin tip ever made.

title: Sci-Fly XR V2
body_html: The Sci-Fly XR V2 returns as the premier modern short board designed for aerials and powered-up, progressive freeriding. Redesigned with a completely new hull and quad fin configuration, this new version has even more grip and hold to perform at your best.

body_html: The Sci-Fly XR V2 returns as the premier modern short board designed for aerials and powered-up, progressive freeriding. Redesigned with a completely new hull and quad fin configuration, this new version has even more grip and hold to perform at your best.

title: Burner XR V1
body_html: Designed to the exact specifications and requirements of kitesurf pioneer Ben Wilson, the all-new Burner XR is his choice for small to medium waves and when conditions are not perfect.

title: Travel Craft V1 90
body_html: The all-new Travel Craft has been created to optimize your foil travel experience. For all of you foiling jetsetters out there, the Travel Craft has been designed to easily fit in your suitcase. No more board bags and no more fibbing about "golf clubs" at the ticket counter.

title: Alien Air V5 4'6"
body_html: We developed the all-new Alien Air V5 to make foiling as easy as possible. Featuring a reduced volume construction, the Alien Air V5 is now even easier to waterstart and progress to more advanced foiling.

title: Wing Raider XL V1
body_html: The Wing Raider XL V1 was designed to pack in every wingfoil specific feature in our design arsenal, propelling your wing game to new heights.

title: Cross Sport 11'0 V1
body_html:
Whether paddling, windsurfing, or winging on a calm mountain lake or venturing into waist-high ocean waves, the 11' Cross Sport V1 is the ultimate multi-sport standup paddleboard. Its windsurfing mast track and removable sUP WINDer keel fin provide windsurfers and wingers the ability to stay upwind while harnessing the power of the wind to propel them across the water.
11' x 33" x 4.8"

title: Cross Sport 11'0 Soft Top V1
body_html:
Whether paddling, windsurfing, or winging on a calm mountain lake, or venturing into waist-high ocean waves, Slingshot's 11' Cross Sport Soft Top is the ultimate multi-sport standup paddleboard. Its windsurfing mast track and removable sUP WINDer keel fin provide upwind performance, and the EVA from tip to tail provides full-board comfort.
Paddle & Windsurf Sail NOT INCLUDED.

title: The Sentry V1.1
body_html: You asked for it! The Sentry V1.1 kite bar has new PU coated center lines which allow for smooth & effortless bar travel with added durability. Our all new quick release is proven and ISO certified, ensuring the quickest and most dependable safety release.

title: Foil Track 9" Fin Pack
body_html:
Use these two nine-inch injection-molded, surf-style A-Box fins in the foil tracks of your foil board to convert it into a finned board. Now you can SUP, wing, or windsurf in shallow water.

*Not compatible with boards equipped with out-the-back foil tracks.

Includes: Dually Hardware x 4

title: Dually V6 Footstraps
body_html: The Dually V6 return for its sixth iteration as our premium and highest-end footstrap system. We have created an all-new cushioning unit and chassis underfoot. The Dually V6 is the pinnacle of comfort for a kiteboarding footstrap.

title: Ghost V2
body_html: Completely redesigned for 2023, the Ghost V2 is built on a one luff-strut platform and an aspect ratio optimized to make it the ultimate session saver. With a lightweight frame, smooth power delivery, intuitive steering, and great upwind reach, you won’t have to miss out on those light wind days any longer.

title: UFO V2
body_html: The UFO V2 kite has been redesigned with the lightest build yet. Our design team reduced the leading edge weight by 25% along with adding a new streamlined bridle system with more premium materials. Riders will instantly feel less drag through the air, the ability to foil in even less wind and an unmatched foiling performance with the all new UFO V2.

title: Blow Hard Kite/Wing Pump
body_html: Making wind sports easier has always been one of the main goals at Slingshot. Especially when it comes to streamlining gear setup. With that in mind, we're happy to introduce the Blow Hard pump. Thanks to its large 3.2-liter capacity and effortless downstroke, getting pumped and on the water has never been easier.

title: HG Kite / Wind / Wing Rear Shim
body_html: Replacement rear shim for the Hover Glide system. This shim is responsible for setting your stabilizer AOA and securing it to the fuselage.

title: Blaster V1 Wing
body_html: The new Blaster V1 Wing introduces winging to the masses with its simple, user-friendly design at an unbeatable price. Whether you use your wing with skates, skis, or on the water, the Blaster V1 is quick to set up and incredibly intuitive to use.

title: Fly Strap V1 Footstraps
body_html: The Fly Strap is a lightweight, minimal footstrap design created to reduce your setup's overall weight and increase control over your board.

title: ISUP Pump
body_html:
High pressure inflatable SUP pump with pressure gauge and standard H3 valve adapter hose. Two stage pump that pumps high volume/lower pressure and switches to low volume/high pressure to ensure your inflatable SUP is pumps up tight.

*NOT COMPATIBLE WITH KITES AND WINGS

body_html: We've got you covered with Copycat removable and walkable liners. Great for those who are frequently in and out of the straps and have to travel long distances by foot, the triple density soles help protect and secure your feet both in and out of the water.
