title: Freestyle V2
body_html: Freestyle V2 is our dedicated freestyle foil board that comes in 87L and 115L sizes. Now featuring updated foil tracks, plus an inset bottom carry handle to get you in and out of the water with ease. The Freestyle V2 will have you out there riding with style!

title: Freestyle V2
body_html: Freestyle V2 is our dedicated freestyle foil board that comes in 87L and 115L sizes. Now featuring updated foil tracks, plus an inset bottom carry handle to get you in and out of the water with ease. The Freestyle V2 will have you out there riding with style!

title: Phantasm Aluminum Wide Body Mast to Fuse Adapter
body_html: Attach your wide body Phantasm mast to your Phantasm fuse.

title: PHANTASM ALUMINUM WIDE BODY MAST PEDESTAL
body_html: Lightweight pedestal base for Phantasm wide body masts.

title: PTM 926mm Front Wing V1 (1263 cm<sup>2</sup> HA)
body_html: The high aspect PTM 926 wing is an incredibly efficient pumping machine. It generates a ton of lift and forward traction from both board pumping and carving and has incredible glide.

title: Phantasm Stabilizer 400mm V1 (280 cm2)
body_html: The best all around shimless stabilizer that crosses all sports categories. Perfectly balanced or use with any Phantasm front wing or fuselage.

title: PTM 1001mm Front Wing V1 (1119 cm<sup>2</sup> HA)
body_html: The PTM 1001 was designed to deliver exceptional glide and give you a ton of forward traction with each pump.

title: PTM 1001/710 Lower Package V1
body_html: The PTM 1001/710 Lower Package was designed to deliver the most glide and give you a ton of forward traction with each pump. This setup of a PTM 1001 Front Wing, 400 Rear Stabilizer and 710 Fuse makes even the tiniest bump feel like a giant open-ocean roller.

title: PTM 684mm Front Wing V1 (952 cm2 HP)
body_html: The Phantasm Technical Mastery (PTM) 684 Front Wing was developed by our design team using feedback from Phantasm riders worldwide. Riders who are looking for speed and agility, but still want great confidence-inspiring stability should look no further than the PTM 684.

title: PTM 926/710 Lower Package V1
body_html: The high-aspect PTM 926 wing is a pumping machine that retains smooth turning ability and generates an enlightening amount of lift from any carve. Matched with the 710 fuse and 400 rear stabilizer, this is a great setup for Wing, Wake and SUP.

title: PTM 684/710 Lower Package V1
body_html: The Phantasm 684/710 Lower Package is an all-new extremely dynamic foil combination. This package of PTM 684 Front Wing, PS 400 Rear Stabilizer and 710 Fuse is by far our most all-around performance foil set-up we make.

title: WF-T V1 4'5" Board Only
body_html: The WF-T V1 is our all-new entry-level 4'5" foil board and is compression molded, which increases the overall durability and decreases buoyancy so riders don't have to fight against the float of the board when starting out.

title: Phantasm Jack Plate V1
body_html: The Phantasm Jack Plate is an adapter that allows you to use your Phantasm foil with either a medium or deep Tuttle Box board. The Tuttle adapters can be moved forward or backwards on the plate, allowing for precise foil placement.

title: PFI 633/710 Lower Package V1
body_html: The Phantasm Freeride Infinity (PFI) 633/710 Lower Package was built to provide you with maximum freeride performance. With equal parts speed, stability, lift and maneuverability, this is the most predictable and user-friendly foil on the market.

title: PFI 730/872 Lower Package V1
body_html: We wanted the perfect lower for maneuver-oriented windsurf foiling. The result is this package of PFI 730 Front Wing, PS 400 Rear Stabilizer and 872 Fuse. The PFI 730 front wing is a polished, refined and scaled-down version of our most popular wing to date, the Infinity 76.

title: PFI 730/710 Lower Package V1
body_html: The PFI 730/710 Lower Package combination is a high-performance lower aspect front wing that gives it tons of lift, stability, and dynamic performance. This combination provides ideal performance for both Surf Foiling and Wing Foiling. It's also a great Kite Foil set up for heavier riders in lighter winds.

title: Phantasm Stabilizer 325mm V1 (202 cm2)
body_html: The Phantasm 325 Stabilizer is a smaller, faster and more maneuverable stabilizer.

title: PFI 928mm Front Wing V1 (2389 cm<sup>2</sup> LA)
body_html: The Phantasm PFI 928 delivers unrivaled stability, ease of use and rapid progression to all weight classes and riding styles.

title: PFI 730mm Front Wing V1 (1456 cm<sup>2</sup> LA)
body_html: The PFI 730 Front Wing is a high-performance lower aspect front wing that gives it tons of lift, stability, and dynamic performance. This combination provides ideal performance for both Surf Foiling and Wing Foiling. It's also a great Kite Foil set up for heavier riders in lighter winds.

title: Phantasm Fuselage
body_html: The Phantasm features a high-performance aircraft-grade aluminum alloy fuselage that has been shaped and designed to offer unmatched stiffness and strength.

title: Phantasm Fuselage
body_html: The Phantasm features a high-performance aircraft-grade aluminum alloy fuselage that has been shaped and designed to offer unmatched stiffness and strength.

title: Phantasm Fuselage
body_html: The Phantasm features a high-performance aircraft-grade aluminum alloy fuselage that has been shaped and designed to offer unmatched stiffness and strength.

title: PFH 657mm Front Wing V1 (743 cm2 SW)
body_html: The PFH 657 is a very unique high-performance medium aspect front wing that gives it limitless speed, agility, maneuverability and carving performance.

title: Phantasm Aluminum Mast V1
body_html: The Phantasm aluminum mast is made from light and strong 7075 aircraft-grade aluminum.

title: Phantasm Aluminum Mast V1
body_html: The Phantasm aluminum mast is made from light and strong 7075 aircraft-grade aluminum.

title: Phantasm Aluminum Mast V1
body_html: The Phantasm aluminum mast is made from light and strong 7075 aircraft-grade aluminum.

title: PFH 767mm Front Wing V1 (860 cm<sup>2</sup> SW)
body_html: The Performance Freeride High-Performance (PFH) 767 is a unique medium-aspect front wing with limitless speed, agility, maneuverability and carving performance. If you are looking for a modern blend of speed and precision turning, this foil will deliver space-age performance.

title: PFI 633mm Front Wing V1 (1270 cm<sup>2</sup> LA)
body_html: The PFI 633 Front Wing is the ultimate blend of performance and comfort. Designed to be quick, user-friendly and versatile, this is the one freeride foil wing that will help you progress to the next level.

title: Phantasm Carbon Mast V1.1
body_html: The stiffest carbon mast on the market delivers the most predictable ride—no matter your speed or style.

title: Phantasm Carbon Mast V1.1
body_html: The stiffest carbon mast on the market delivers the most predictable ride—no matter your speed or style.

title: Phantasm Carbon Mast V1.1
body_html: The stiffest carbon mast on the market delivers the most predictable ride—no matter your speed or style.

title: Phantasm Carbon Mast V1.1
body_html: The stiffest carbon mast on the market delivers the most predictable ride—no matter your speed or style.

title: Phantasm Carbon Wide Mast V2
body_html: The Phantasm wide-body masts are the stiffest carbon mast on the market delivering the most predictable ride. These masts are capable of handling all the torque from the largest boards and biggest foil wings.

title: Phantasm Carbon Wide Mast V2
body_html: The Phantasm wide-body masts are the stiffest carbon mast on the market delivering the most predictable ride. These masts are capable of handling all the torque from the largest boards and biggest foil wings.

title: Phantasm Carbon Wide Mast V2
body_html: The Phantasm wide-body masts are the stiffest carbon mast on the market delivering the most predictable ride. These masts are capable of handling all the torque from the largest boards and biggest foil wings.

title: Phantasm Aluminum Wide Mast V1
body_html: The Phantasm aluminum mast is made from light and strong 7075 aircraft-grade aluminum. It is compatible with all Phantasm fuses and is 15% lighter, and 12% stronger than the regular Hover Glide mast.

title: Phantasm Aluminum Wide Mast V1
body_html: The Phantasm aluminum mast is made from light and strong 7075 aircraft-grade aluminum. It is compatible with all Phantasm fuses and is 15% lighter, and 12% stronger than the regular Hover Glide mast.

title: PFH 581mm Front Wing V1 (648 cm<sup>2 </sup>SW)
body_html: The Performance Freeride High-Performance (PFH) 581 Front Wing is the fastest and highest performance wing in the Phantasm kite range. This wing's shape and size deliver hero-level maneuverability, speed and response.

title: PFI 835mm Front Wing V1 (2030 cm<sup>2</sup> LA)
body_html: The PFI 835 is a high-performance lower aspect front wing that delivers tons of lift, stability, and dynamic performance.

title: PFI 928/710 Lower Package V1
body_html: Built for progression and ease of use, this Phantasm foil package will get you going in the lightest of breeze and provides the stability needed to keep you flying.

title: The Sentry Quick Release Small Loop
body_html: The Sentry Quick Release Small Loop is a smaller chicken loop with a metal trimming that will provide maximum performance when used with a sliding rope harness.

title: Sentry Leash
body_html: This product contains one(1) short push-away style safety leash. Measuring at 48 cm relaxed, the Sentry leash keeps safety in mind with its easy-to-see red push-away release featured front and center in your field of view.

title: Twin Tip Grab Handle
body_html: Replacement Twin Tip Grab Handle

title: Sentry Swivel Set + Flagging Line w/ Tube
body_html: This product contains all the parts needed to replace your flagging line, flagging line PU tube, and below the bar swivel assembly on your Sentry bar.

title: Sentry QR Screw Pack - 10 pcs.
body_html: This product contains ten replacement 30mm set screws.

title: Sentry Trim Handle
body_html: This product contains one replacement trim handle and one stopper ball found at the end of the depower trim rope.

title: Sentry Safety Ring - 3 pcs
body_html: This product contains three stainless steel safety rings. These rings are found attached to the riders end of the flagging line and serve as the safety leash attachment/connection point.

title: Sentry Ring T Bar - 12 pcs
body_html: This product contains twelve stainless steel T-Bar rings. This ring can be found directly connected to the flagging line securing the safety ring in place. This part also serves as a flagging line swivel.

title: Sentry 10 Ball Bearing Set
body_html: This product contains ten ceramic ball bearings to be used to replace missing or broken parts found in your below the bar swivel.

title: Sentry Quick Release Complete + Flagging Line w/ Tube
body_html: This product contains all the parts needed to replace your lower quick release assembly as well as your flagging line and flagging line PU tube on your Sentry bar.

title: Sentry Quick Release STD Loop
body_html: This product contains one replacement standard length chicken loop for your Sentry Bar.

title: Sentry Depower Line & Flagging Line w/ Tube
body_html: This product contains all the parts needed to replace both your center PU coated tubes on your Sentry bar.

title: Sentry Trim Line
body_html: This product contains all the parts needed to replace your dynema trim line on your Sentry bar.

title: Sentry Flagging Line Only
body_html: This product contains all the parts needed to replace your flagging line on your Sentry bar.

title: SUP WINDer

The sUP WINDer from Slingshot is the first of its kind stick on keel.

*The sUP WINDer is not compatible with inflatable SUP's.

title: Slingshot Foil Surf Sleeve
body_html: After a long session on the water, you will be glad you invested in the Foil Surf Sleeve. Easily slip your most prized possession, fully assembled, into this cozy sleeve and call it a successful day on the water.

title: Windsurf Strap Hardware
body_html: 2-pack of stainless steel Phillips head footstraps screws. M6 x 30mm self tapping screws

title: WF-1 4'6" Board Only
body_html: A modified version of one of our performance wakesurfers, the WF-1 board features a track mount for foil surfing, pumping, carving and long-lining on-foil, and a two-fin configuration for use as a standard surfer.

title: WF-2 4'10" Board Only
body_html: A padded, foam-topped, beginner-friendly board with plenty of size and volume to get you up and foiling behind your boat, jetski, pontoon, zodiac or anything else with a motor big enough to tow a rider. Doubles as a wakesurfer when not in use with a foil.

title: Foil Track Nut, Stainless Steel
body_html:
Stainless Steel Foil Board Track "T" Nut M8 Thread Sold as 1 each

This is the hardware that slides into the track of Slingshot Foil Boards. They are used to connect Hoverglide and Phantasm foils to Slingshot Foil Boards. Paired with Slingshot Foil Mounting Hardware.

title: RPX V1
body_html: Fueled by insights from the world's best freestyle riders and born from the DNA of the legendary RPM, we developed the all-new RPX. The RPX is built upon the longstanding Slingshot invention of the "Open C Canopy," which offers a flatter arc for extensive range, depower, and upwind ability, as well as accurate handling and energetic response.

title: Wing Craft V1
body_html: We started with a compact platform built for pumping and precise foil control, gave it a flat rocker, kick tail and width demanded for ultra-early takeoff. Sprinkled in enough thickness and stability for the big guys to do a submerged knee start using even the smallest size in the line, and voilà, the Wing Craft was born.

title: The Sentry V1
body_html: Click-In chicken loop technology meets intuitive, auto-swivel, line untwisting in this all-new state of the art control bar. The Sentry bar has been thoroughly tested and is proudly ISO compliant.

title: Freestyle
body_html:
The Freestyle 115L is the go-to board for wave sailors, freestylers or anybody who demands a centered footstrap position for full control of both rails.
The Freestyle 87 is the board for dedicated foilers who want to foil even when the trees are trembling.

title: Freestyle
body_html:
The Freestyle 115L is the go-to board for wave sailors, freestylers or anybody who demands a centered footstrap position for full control of both rails.
The Freestyle 87 is the board for dedicated foilers who want to foil even when the trees are trembling.

title: 2020 Space Mob Liners
body_html:
We’ve got you covered with removable and walkable liners. Great for those who are frequently in and out of the straps and have to travel long distances by foot, the triple density soles help protect your feet from the elements and make entry/exit even faster.A traditional shoe-style lace. Since riders tend to spend the majority of their days rocking the inner liner, we wanted a foolproof closure that doesn’t get in the way or complicate things.

Compatible with 2020 Space Mob Boots.

body_html:
We’ve got you covered with removable and walkable liners. Great for those who are frequently in and out of the straps and have to travel long distances by foot, the triple density soles help protect your feet from the elements and make entry/exit even faster.A traditional shoe-style lace. Since riders tend to spend the majority of their days rocking the inner liner, we wanted a foolproof closure that doesn’t get in the way or complicate things.

Compatible with 2020 Space Mob Boots.
